name: Paris: Jigsaw Puzzles
description:
Jigsaw Puzzles of Paris including the Eiffel Tower and other famous streets and buildings. Do puzzle in a new way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving game play will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Paris: Jigsaw Puzzles is designed for adults and for kids.

----IMPORTANT----

To play all puzzles choose ---> Library in Steam ---> click Play and choose the puzzle you want to play.
